str:translations.str:about_feeds: This is a web feed, also known as an Atom feed. Subscribe by copying the URL from the address bar into your newsreader. Visit About Feeds to learn more and get started. It's free.

feed.title: ~/nbaig-dev - rust-cli
feed.subtitle: I am a backend web developer with 14+ years of experience. In this blog I will be posting my journey with the Rust Programming Language.

entry.title: CLI alternatives written in Rust.
entry.summary: Welcome to this comprehensive list of command-line interface (CLI) utilities written in Rust. Rust, known for its performance and safety, has been increasingly used to write CLI tools. this post, we will explore some of these tools, their features, and how they can be used as alternatives to their traditional counterparts.
